tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE rural_infrastructure_projects (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 project_name VARCHAR(255),
 location VARCHAR(255),
 start_date DATE,
 end_date DATE,
 budget DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE rural_areas_infrastructure_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    project_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE project_monitoring_data (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    monitoring_date DATE,
    progress_status VARCHAR(20),
    CONSTRAINT FK_project_id FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES rural_areas_infrastructure_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE projects (
    project_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    budget DECIMAL(12, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE InfrastructureProjects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_type VARCHAR(50),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE ImpactAssessment (
    assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    impact_rating INT,
    assessment_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES InfrastructureProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Stakeholders (
    stakeholder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stakeholder_name VARCHAR(255),
    stakeholder_type VARCHAR(50),
    project_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES InfrastructureProjects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rural_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(255),
    latitude DECIMAL,
    longitude DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES rural_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_impact (
    impact_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    impact_type VARCHAR(50),
    impact_description TEXT,
    metrics VARCHAR(255),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES rural_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE evaluation_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    report_date DATE,
    evaluator VARCHAR(100),
    findings TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES rural_projects(project_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_metrics (
    metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(50),
    value DECIMAL,
    unit VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES rural_projects(project_id)
);
